commit.message:
Revert "Disable additional Linux builds which depend on first Linux build bundle"

This reverts commit ad22b985262aa5aa1c6e01e6e061d57a045e48d4.
Disable additional Linux builds which depend on first Linux build bundle
Switch Linux builds to use bundled zlib
Disable tests, remove unsupported --with-msvc-toolset-version, add missing dependency for x86 build, turn on verbose logging for x64
Replace product-bundles and test-bundles targets with images
Replace --with-version-opt with --with-user-release-suffix, drop --enable-jtreg-failure-handler and move make targets to make command
